column2:
Computer grid to help the world

Your computer can now help solve the worlds most difficult health and social problems

Lewis-Francis turns to Christie

Mark Lewis-Francis has stepped up his preparations for the new season by taking advice from British sprint icon Linford Christie.

'Debate needed' on donations cap

A cap on donations to political parties should not be introduced yet, the elections watchdog has said.

X Factor show gets second series

TV talent show The X Factor is to return for a second series after being recommissioned by ITV.

German bidder in talks with LSE

Deutsche Boerse bosses have held "constructive, professional and friendly" talks with the London Stock Exchange (LSE), its chief has said.
